alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 07 at 1:43PM MST until December 07 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, west winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, west winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Highlands and Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 8 PM MST this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 9 AM to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass
